00009 #ifndef __SPI_H__
00010 #define __SPI_H__
00011 
00016 /* SPI Macros for the TELOSB Platform
00017  *
00018  *
00019  *
00020  */
00021 #ifdef PLATFORM_TELOSB
00022 
00023 #define SPI_WAIT_EOTX() while(!(U0TCTL & TXEPT))
00024 #define SPI_WAIT_EORX() while(!(IFG1 & URXIFG0))
00025 
00026 #define SPI_TX_BUF U0TXBUF
00027 #define SPI_RX_BUF U0RXBUF
00028 
00029 // little hack :)
00030 #define EIMSK P1IE
00031 
00032 // initialize UART to SPI Mode, setup Pins
00033 #define PLAT_SPI_INIT() do {                            \
00034       U0CTL = SWRST;                                    \
00035       /* 8 bits, SPI, Master, Reset State */            \
00036       U0CTL |= CHAR | SYNC | MM;                        \
00037       /* Delay Tx Half Cycle, SMCLK, 3 Pin Mode */      \
00038       U0TCTL = CKPH | SSEL_3 | STC | TXEPT;             \
00039       /* Baud Rate & Modulation Control Not Used */     \
00040       U0BR0  = 0x02;                                    \
00041       U0BR1  = 0x00;                                    \
00042       U0MCTL = 0x00;                                    \
00043       /* make sure Uart0 interrupts are off */          \
00044       IE1 &= ~(UTXIE0 | URXIE0);                        \
00045       /* set peripheral mode for MOSI MISO UCLK */      \
00046       MASK_3(P3SEL, 1, 2, 3);                           \
00047       /*UNMASK_1(P4SEL, CC2420_SFD_PIN);*/              \
00048       /* enable UART0 SPI, send, recv */                \
00049       ME1 |= USPIE0 /*| UTXE0 | URXE0*/;                \
00050       /* Disable Reset State */                         \
00051       U0CTL &= ~SWRST;                                  \
00052    } while(0)
00053 
00054 // enable Port 1, Pin 0 (FIFOP) Interrupt
00055 #define PLAT_ENABLE_FIFOP_INT() do {            \
00056       P1DIR |=  (1 << 0);                       \
00057       P1IES &= ~(1 << 0);                       \
00058       P1IE  |=  (1 << 0);                       \
00059    } while(0)
00060 
00061 
00062 /* SPI Macros the AVR Arch
00063  *
00064  *
00065  *
00066  */
00067 
00068 #elif defined(ARCH_AVR)
00069 
00070 // other
00071 #define SPI_WAIT() { while (!(SPSR & (1 << SPIF))); }
00072 #define SPI_WAIT_EOTX() SPI_WAIT()
00073 #define SPI_WAIT_EORX() SPI_WAIT()
00074 
00075 #define SPI_TX_BUF SPDR
00076 #define SPI_RX_BUF SPDR
00077 
00078 
00079 #define PLAT_SPI_INIT() do {                    \
00080       MASK_2(SPCR, SPE, MSTR);                  \
00081       MASK_1(SPSR, SPI2X);                      \
00082    } while(0)
00083 
00084 #define PLAT_ENABLE_FIFOP_INT() do {                    \
00085       EICRB |= (0x3 << (CC2420_FIFOP_PIN - 4) * 2);     \
00086       MASK_1(EIFR, CC2420_FIFOP_PIN);                   \
00087    } while(0)
00088 
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 static inline void spi_tx_byte(uint8_t byte)
00092 {
00093    SPI_TX_BUF = byte;
00094    SPI_WAIT_EOTX();
00095 }
00096 
00097 static inline uint8_t spi_rx(void)
00098 {
00099    SPI_TX_BUF = 0;
00100    SPI_WAIT_EOTX();
00101    SPI_WAIT_EORX();
00102    return SPI_RX_BUF;
00103 }
00104 
00105 static inline void spi_rx_garbage(void)
00106 {
00107    SPI_TX_BUF = 0;
00108    SPI_WAIT_EOTX();
00109    SPI_WAIT_EORX();
00110    uint8_t trash = SPI_RX_BUF;
00111 }
00112 
00113 // check
00114 static inline uint16_t spi_rx_word(void)
00115 {
00116    uint16_t ret = 0;
00117    SPI_TX_BUF = 0;
00118    SPI_WAIT_EOTX();
00119    SPI_WAIT_EORX();
00120    ret = SPI_RX_BUF << 8;
00121    SPI_TX_BUF = 0;
00122    SPI_WAIT_EOTX();
00123    SPI_WAIT_EORX();
00124  
00125    ret |= SPI_RX_BUF;
00126    
00127    return ret;
00128 }
